description: Trusted types allow you to lock down insecure parts of the DOM API and prevent client-side cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.
description_html: Trusted types allow you to lock down insecure parts of the DOM API and prevent client-side cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.
name: Trusted types

compat.description: Requires TrustedHTML instance when trusted types are enforced
Requires TrustedScript instance when trusted types are enforced
Requires TrustedScriptURL instance when trusted types are enforced
Requires TrustedScript instance when trusted types are enforced.
Requires TrustedScript instance in HTMLScriptElement when trusted types are enforced.
Requires TrustedHTML instance when trusted types are enforced
code parameter requires TrustedScript instance when trusted types are enforced.
